what: genCountR: A Package for Using Roberts and Utych's (2019) Gendered Language Dictionary — genCountR-package
title: genCountR: A Package for Using Roberts and Utych's (2019) Gendered Language Dictionary — genCountR-package
text: R package allows users generate gendered language score according gendered language dictionary Roberts Utych (2019).

title: genCountR: A Package for Using Roberts and Utych's (2019) Gendered Language Dictionary — genCountR-package
text: Maintainer: Damon Roberts damon.charles.roberts@gmail.com (ORCID)

title: gen_count — gen_count
text: Counts number masculine feminine words document

title: gen_count — gen_count
text: text (string): string object.

title: gen_count — gen_count
text: data.frame word dictionary matched text number occurances.

title: gen_count — gen_count
text: Takes number words loosely categorized Masculine, Feminine, Neutral based Roberts Utych's (2019) definition. Feminine words score 2.5, Neutral words score higher 2.5 lower 5.5, Masculine words score higher 5.5.

title: gen_count — gen_count
code: text <- 'This person was a heroine due to their fighting during the war.' result_df <- genCountR::gen_count(text)

title: gen_score — gen_score
text: Calculates score supplied text string based Gendered Language Dictionary created Roberts Utych (2019).

title: gen_score — gen_score
text: text (string): string object

title: gen_score — gen_score
text: list object avg_score supplied text string, total_score supplied text string, data.frame matches

title: gen_score — gen_score
text: Takes matched words occurrence supplied text, finds score matched words dictionary, sums scores divides total number words dictionary.

title: gen_score — gen_score
code: text <- 'Hero. hero Heroine. heroine, Prison. Prisom.' result <- genCountR::gen_score(text) result$avg_score #> [1] 3.407279 result$total_score #> [1] 20.44367 result$df #>      word count   mean.a total_score #> 1    hero     2 5.615385   11.230770 #> 2 heroine     2 1.800000    3.600000 #> 3  prison     1 5.612903    5.612903

title: text_clean — text_clean
text: Cleans supplied text string converts list individual words.

title: text_clean — text_clean
text: text (string): string object.

title: text_clean — text_clean
text: list word lower case without punctuation.

title: text_clean — text_clean
text: Takes string, converts characters lower case, removes punctuation, splits string individual words.

title: word_count — word_count
text: Count number times particular word dictionary shows document.

title: word_count — word_count
text: word_item (vector array): vector array words text wanting matched dictionary.

title: word_count — word_count
text: data.frame object count masculine, feminine, masculine words.

title: word_count — word_count
text: Takes number words loosely categorized Masculine, Feminine, Neutral based Roberts Utych's (2019) definition. Feminine words score 2.5, Neutral words score higher 2.5 lower 5.5, Masculine words score higher 5.5.
